short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of who's given their update during your stand ups! Available for Google Meet meetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you keep forgetting to ask someone for their update when you're leading your team's Stand Up? Well forget no more!

This extension will show a dropdown of any Participants in your Google Meet, and you can tick them off as you ask each member to give their update.
